snippet: An hour in Chelsea last Saturday was a final look at what could become the old, pre-Sandy gallery scene.
abstract: Roberta Smith describes highlights of several shows at Chelsea galleries that she visited last day before Hurricane Sandy swept in; notes that this is final look at work that was later destroyed or damaged by storm.
lead_paragraph: An hour in Chelsea last Saturday was a final look at what could become the old, pre-Sandy gallery scene.

headline.seo: Chelsea Art Galleries Struggle to Restore and Reopen
headline.main: Chelsea Art Galleries Struggle to Restore and Reopen
headline.print_headline: For Galleries, a Test of Tenacity
